Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=100 µg/ml), Bacillus pyocyaneus CMCCB 10104 (MIC=50 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=50 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC 2002 (MIC=100 µg/ml).
